unfinished: Hmm, looks like we haven't implemented this feature yet. Check back later!

restore.label: Restore reason
restore.helperText: Enter a reason for this restore

rollback.label: Rollback reason
rollback.helperText: Enter a reason for this rollback

copyURL.failure: Failed to copy URL. Have you given the browser proper permissions?

toasts.restoreError: Sorry, there was an error, likely an edit conflict. This edit was not restored.
toasts.rollbackError: Sorry, there was an error performing a rollback.
toasts.newerRev: A newer revision was detected. Your revert was not applied.
toasts.userUndefined: Sorry, the target user does not exist, cannot be found, or is hidden from the public. Your action was not completed.
toasts.userWarnFailed: There was a problem warning the user. Please verify if the user has been warned before issuing another warning.
toasts.protectionRequestFailed: There was a problem requesting protection. Please verify if the request has been made before requesting again.

watch.watching: Watching for changes on {{page}}. Keep this tab open.

rollbackAvailableDialog.content: You have rollback permissions! Would you like to use the faster rollback API in future or continue using a rollback-like setting? You can change this in your preferences at any time.

tamperProtection.warningContent: You are currently using RedWarn in a way that is strongly discouraged under guidelines set at Wikipedia:RedWarn/Abuse. This will be permanently recorded and will prevent you from running legitimate installations of RedWarn. Please contact a RedWarn team developer for assistance.

userSelect.load_wait: Please be patient while the user information is being loaded.
userSelect.levelInfo_none: User has not received any warnings this month
userSelect.levelInfo_notice: User has received a level 1 notice this month
userSelect.levelInfo_caution: User has received a level 2 notice this month
userSelect.levelInfo_warning: User has received a level 3 warning this month. $t(ui:userSelect.report)
userSelect.levelInfo_final: User has received a level 4 final warning this month. $t(ui:userSelect.report)
userSelect.levelInfo_immediate: User has received an immediate level 4 final warning this month. $t(ui:userSelect.report)
userSelect.invalid: The username provided is not valid.
userSelect.fail: Failed to load user information. Try again in a bit.

dialog.title: Issue found
dialog.intro: The following issues are preventing you from continuing:

tooltip.fail: There are issues which are preventing you from continuing. Click here for more information.

reason.levelSelectionLevelNotPresent: There is no level {{level}} ({{levelReadable}}) template available.

templateSearchDialog.instantSelect: Press ENTER to use this template
templateSearchDialog.tip: Tip: Double-click a warning to quickly select it, or press ENTER to select the top result.

validation.fail_template: You don't have a warning template selected.
validation.fail_level: You haven't selected a warning level.
validation.fail_user: You haven't selected a target user.
validation.fail_self: You are not allowed to warn yourself.
validation.fail_required: Some required fields have not been filled in.
validation.failDetailed: $t(ui:warn.validation.fail) If this problem persists, inform the developers.
validation.failDetailed_template: $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_template) Select one from the dropdown or search tool.
validation.failDetailed_user: $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_user) Please enter a username in the target user box.
validation.failDetailed_self: $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_self) If you want to test, please use a sandbox user.
validation.failDetailed_required: Some required fields have not been filled in. Please fill in the required text fields (denoted by an asterisk) found below the warning to be issued.

risky.title: Risky warning
risky.content: You are about to warn {{group, en-handle-an}} {{group}}. Are you sure about this?

progress.finish_nochange: Revert requested but no changes were made. A revert must have already been applied.

configErrorDialog.title: Configuration Error
configErrorDialog.content: Your RedWarn configuration could not be loaded correctly and has been reset. If this issue persists, please contact the RedWarn team.

missing.title: Style Missing
missing.content: The style set in your RedWarn configuration cannot be found. It has been set to the default style for now.

protectionRequest.title: Request Page Protection
protectionRequest.notice: You should not consider requesting page protection as a method for continuing an argument from elsewhere nor as a venue for starting a new discussion regarding article content. If a request contains excessive argument, appears to be intended to resolve a content dispute, includes personal attacks or uncivil comments, or has any other unrelated discussion, it will be removed and no action will be taken.

validation.fail_noLevel: You don't have a protection level selected.
validation.fail_noDuration: You don't have a protection duration selected.
validation.fail_levelEqual: The level and duration requested is already applied.
validation.failDetailed: $t(ui:protectionRequest.validation.fail) If this problem persists, inform the developers.
validation.failDetailed_noLevel: $t(ui:protectionRequest.validation.fail_noLevel) Select one from the left-side panel.
validation.failDetailed_noDuration: $t(ui:protectionRequest.validation.fail_noDuration) Select either "Temporary" or "Indefinite" from the provided options.
validation.failDetailed_levelEqual: $t(ui:protectionRequest.validation.fail_levelEqual) Please select a protection level or duration different from the current protection level/duration.
validation.failDetailed_noReason: $t(ui:protectionRequest.validation.fail_noReason) A reason must be provided for protection requests.
validation.failDetailed_noAdditionalReason: $t(ui:protectionRequest.validation.fail_noAdditionalReason) Please provide an additional reason, or switch to a provided reason using the dropdown.

retarget.text: RedWarn cannot determine if this is an increase or decrease in protection level. This is likely due to a problem in the RedWarn per-wiki configuration. Please indicate whether or not this request in an increase or decrease in protection level.

target.label: Target
target.nonexistent_page: The page you entered does not exist.

comments.label: Additional information
comments.placeholder: Provide additional details about your request.

validation.fail_target: There is no target to be reported.
validation.fail_targetMissing: The page to be reported does not exist.
validation.fail_self: You are not allowed to report yourself.
validation.fail_reason: You did not provide a reason for the report.
validation.fail_short: Your report is believed to be too short to contain substantial information.
validation.fail_exists: The target has already been reported.
validation.failDetailed: An unknown issue ocurred. Please try again.
validation.failDetailed_target: There is no target to be reported. Please make sure that you've selected a valid page or user.
validation.failDetailed_targetMissing: The page to be reported does not exist. Please make sure that the page you are attempting to report exists.
validation.failDetailed_self: You are not allowed to report yourself, even for testing situations.
validation.failDetailed_reason: You did not provide a reason for the report. Please choose a prefilled reason or write your own.
validation.failDetailed_short: Your report is believed to be too short to contain substantial information. Please make sure that your report contains enough detailed information to be useful.
validation.failDetailed_exists: The target has already been reported. You do not need to file this report anymore.

restricted.title: Risky report
restricted.text: You are about to report {{group, en-handle-an}} {{group}}. This may be the incorrect venue for such a report. Are you sure about this?
